body:
i'm thankful for [the new rhye album](https://open.spotify.com/album/6yoGOJsTjU7w2amKcUUX7S?si=K-xwdjidRuCXk55c53JMNg), which is exquisitely soft.

i'm thankful for [this shiba inu spooning with a cat in the sun](https://www.instagram.com/p/BcY5YNVndHa/).

i'm thankful that [the bauhaus designed a socialist utopia for penguins](https://twitter.com/sylvia__north/status/961281998806372352).

i'm thankful for [this post on theology and _the good place_](https://theoutline.com/post/3327/the-good-place-religion-theology?zd=3&zi=asvwh7no).

i'm thankful for this clowning on [benioff and weiss's _star wars_](https://twitter.com/petridishes/status/961024905599967234).

i'm thankful that it's not too late to sign up for [kkwweekly](https://tinyletter.com/kkwweekkly), where [evie](https://twitter.com/ohevie) will summarize the content in kim's app every week.

i'm thankful for kim and kanye in tokyo together, [buying manga](https://kotaku.com/kim-kardashian-is-just-like-you-she-shops-for-manga-1822826540).

i'm thankful to hope that at some point we all have the joy of [kid cudi's dancing in this video](https://twitter.com/AyeshaASiddiqi/status/961846036380631040).
